算法设计

1

① p = L->next

② p != NULL

③ p->next = L->next

④ L->next = p

⑤ p =q

2

① top != -1 || p != NULL

② ++top

③ p->lChild

④ top--

⑤ p->rChile

3

① A.vertexNum

② A.arcNum

③ i

④ B.adjlist.link = NULL

⑤ p->adjvex = j

⑥ p->next = B.adjlist[i]

⑦ B.adjlist[i].link = p

⑧ p->adjvex = i

⑨ p->next = B.adjlist[j]

⑩ B.adjlist[j].link = p
